text: Good morning colleagues! I'm having some problems with HS forms in some of my pages (built with React components). First of all, I want to point out that I use the forms retrieved from the HS account, I don't customize them in any way through code and I also add them as a component in my pages. The problem I am facing is that, sometimes, the thank you page does not work (it is blank and without any html content loaded), even if I have configured it in the CMS.

The problem only occurs when I use `<Icon fieldPath="..."/>` inside an `Island` component. Is there any way to fix or work around this?
<@UAYBXDG4U> <@U02G7H60YCS> help pls)

There is one oddity. I decided to try using hublTemplateData and here is the tag `Icon` during local development, it returns the tag `<span ...><svg>...</svg></span>` in which the svg is located, but after deployment, when viewing the returned string, instead of span, it returns `<div ...><svg>...</svg></div>`
Second Screen - local, Thrid - prod.
For now I'm using the solution via hublTemplateData. But I would like some kind of fix for using the `<Icon />` component inside `<Island />`

Same problem. Both Form and Icon components are not displayed for me when used inside Island. In the case of Icon, I used hublTemplateData to get around this. I'll probably have to do the same with the form...
